name: healthy-pumpkin-cookies
ingredients: 3/4 cup quick oats (for grain-free, try these Keto Cookies)
1/4 cup sugar, unrefined or erythritol if desired
1/4 tsp pumpkin pie spice, or additional cinnamon
1/3 cup canned pumpkin, or mashed sweet potato
1/3 cup almond butter, or regular butter spread

name: microwave-cookies-chocolate-chip
ingredients: 1/4 cup white, spelt, or oat flour (a keto option is listed above in this post)
1/2 tbsp oil or softened nut butter

name: peanut-butter-blossom-cookies
ingredients: 1/2 cup peanut butter,  or allergy-friendly sub
3 tbsp flour (spelt, white, oat, sorghum, and rice all work)
2 tbsp  applesauce or milk of choice

name: vegan-nilla-wafers
ingredients: 3/4 cup spelt, white, or oat flour (for flourless, try these Keto Cookies)
1/4 tsp each: salt and baking soda

name: peanut-butter-no-bake-cookies
ingredients: 1 2/3  cups oats (for keto, make Keto Peanut Butter Cookies)
1/2  cup peanut butter or allergy friendly sub
1/2 cup honey or pure maple syrup or agave
3 tbsp butter or coconut oil (or 3 tbsp extra nut butter or milk of choice)

name: macaroons-recipe-coconut-cookies
ingredients: 1 tbsp almond meal or flour of choice
1/2 cup + 1 tbsp milk of choice or coconutmilk
3 1/2 tbsp pure maple syrup, honey, or agave (a keto option is listed earlier in the post)
1/4 tsp pure vanilla or coconut extract

name: keto-thin-mints-low-carb
ingredients: pinch uncut stevia OR 3 tbsp pure maple syrup
Only if using stevia, add 3 tbsp water
1/2 cup chocolate chips or sugar free chocolate chips

name: macaroons-recipe-coconut-cookies
ingredients: 1 tbsp almond meal or flour of choice
1/2 cup + 1 tbsp milk of choice or coconutmilk
3 1/2 tbsp pure maple syrup, honey, or agave (a keto option is listed earlier in the post)
1/4 tsp pure vanilla or coconut extract

name: chocolate-crinkle-cookies-recipe
ingredients: 1 cup flour (For low carb, try these Keto Chocolate Cookies)
1/4 cup salted butter or vegan butter
1 egg or 4 tbsp milk of choice
powdered sugar or sugar free alternative

name: the-best-healthy-chocolate-chip-cookies
ingredients: 4 tbsp coconut sugar or brown sugar
4 tbsp white sugar or additional coconut sugar
1/3 cup chocolate chips or more if desired
2 tbsp vegetable or melted coconut oil
3-5 tbsp milk of choice, as needed

name: coconut-flour-cookies
ingredients: 2 1/2 tbsp liquid sweetener (such as maple syrup, honey, or keto syrup)
1/4 cup melted coconut oil or butter

name: keto-peanut-butter-cookies
ingredients: 1/2 cup peanut butter, or nut butter of choice
3 tbsp powdered erythritol or powdered sugar

name: chocolate-peanut-butter-cookies
ingredients: 1 cup spelt, white, or oat flour (For low carb, try these Keto Chocolate Cookies)
2 tbsp pure maple syrup, honey, or agave
mini or regular chocolate chips, optional

name: secret-peanut-butter-cookies
ingredients: 1/2 cup peanut butter, or allergy friendly sub
2 tbsp applesauce (or make these Keto Peanut Butter Cookies)
3 tbsp flour (spelt, white, oat, sorghum, rice all work)

name: chocolate-no-bake-cookies
ingredients: 2 cups quick oats (For keto no-bakes, try these Fat Bombs)
1/2 cup peanut butter or allergy-friendly sub
1/2 cup pure maple syrup, honey, or agave (or 2/3 cup sugar and 1/2 cup milk of choice)
optional handful mini chocolate chips, shredded coconut, etc.

name: flourless-chocolate-chip-cookies
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups rolled oats (for grain free, try these Keto Cookies)

name: healthy-girl-scout-cookies-tagalongs
ingredients: 2 tbsp pure maple syrup or honey OR stevia to taste
1 1/2 tbsp veg or melted coconut oil
20 tsp peanut butter or allergy-friendly sub
1/2 cup chocolate chips or Sugar Free Chocolate Chips

name: peanut-butter-no-bake-cookies
ingredients: 1 2/3  cups oats (for keto, make Keto Peanut Butter Cookies)
1/2  cup peanut butter or allergy friendly sub
1/2 cup honey or pure maple syrup or agave
3 tbsp butter or coconut oil (or 3 tbsp extra nut butter or milk of choice)

name: the-best-healthy-chocolate-chip-cookies
ingredients: 4 tbsp coconut sugar or brown sugar
4 tbsp white sugar or additional coconut sugar
1/3 cup chocolate chips or more if desired
2 tbsp vegetable or melted coconut oil
3-5 tbsp milk of choice, as needed

name: tahini-cookies-recipe
ingredients: 1 cup flour (white, spelt, or oat flour. For low carb, make these Keto Cookies)
1/2 cup sugar or packed coconut sugar

name: chocolate-snowball-cookies
ingredients: 3/4 cup white, spelt, or oat flour (a keto version is linked above)
1/4 cup finely chopped walnuts or pecans (for nut-free: Chocolate Brownie Cookies)
1/4 cup powdered sugar (a date-sweetened version is also linked above)
1/4 cup mini chocolate chips or finely chopped chocolate
optional additional powdered sugar for rolling

name: breakfast-cookies-recipe
ingredients: scant 1/2 cup applesauce or mashed banana
1/4 cup almond or cashew butter OR allergy-friendly sub
2-3 tbsp mini chocolate chips or sugar free chocolate chips
2 1/2 tbsp freeze-dried raspberries OR 2 tbsp dried fruit or more chocolate chips
optional 2 tbsp sugar or pinch stevia (see note below)
optional add-ins, such as chia seeds, shredded coconut, etc.

name: chocolate-coconut-cookies
ingredients: 1 tbsp flour  of choice or protein powder
1 cup shredded coconut (must be unsweetened, full fat)
1/4 cup pure maple syrup or honey or agave (for sugar free, see note below)

name: peanut-butter-blossom-cookies
ingredients: 1/2 cup peanut butter,  or allergy-friendly sub
3 tbsp flour (spelt, white, oat, sorghum, and rice all work)
2 tbsp  applesauce or milk of choice

name: vegan-sugar-cookies
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups flour (spelt, white, or oat flour) Or make these Keto Cookies
6 tbsp oil or melted vegan butter

name: keto-cookies-recipe
ingredients: 2-4 tbsp chocolate chips or sugar free chocolate chips
2 tbsp powdered sugar or powdered erythritol OR stevia equivalent
2-3 tsp milk of choice, as needed

name: secret-peanut-butter-cookies
ingredients: 1/2 cup peanut butter, or allergy friendly sub
2 tbsp applesauce (or make these Keto Peanut Butter Cookies)
3 tbsp flour (spelt, white, oat, sorghum, rice all work)

name: snowball-cookies-that-melt-in-your-mouth
ingredients: 2 cups flour (white, spelt, ww pastry, or Bob's gf work)
1/2 cup finely chopped walnuts or almonds or pecans
1/2 cup powdered sugar or sugar free powdered sugar
optional additional powdered sugar or cocoa powder, for rolling

name: vegan-sugar-cookies
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups flour (spelt, white, or oat flour) Or make these Keto Cookies
6 tbsp oil or melted vegan butter

name: 3-ingredient-peanut-butter-bites
ingredients: 1 1/2 cup peanut butter or allergy friendly sub
2/3 cup coconut flour, oat flour, or protein powder (Here's a coconut-free version)
1/3 cup liquid sweetener (such as pure maple syrup, honey, or keto syrup)
optional 3 oz chocolate melted with 4 tsp oil if desired for a smoother sauce

name: vegan-levain-chocolate-chip-cookies
ingredients: 1 cup white, spelt, or oat flour (for flourless, try these Keto Cookies)
1/4 cup brown sugar, unrefined if desired
3 tbsp regular sugar, unrefined if desired

name: cookie-dough-balls
ingredients: 1/2 cup oat flour or protein powder

name: cream-cheese-stuffed-cinnamon-sugar-pillow-cookies
ingredients: 1/2 cup sugar (or coconut sugar or xylitol)
1/4 cup cream cheese or vegan cream cheese
1 1/2 tbsp powdered sugar or sugar free powdered sugar
equal parts cinnamon and sugar or xylitol if desired for coating

name: keto-cookies-recipe
ingredients: 2-4 tbsp chocolate chips or sugar free chocolate chips
2 tbsp powdered sugar or powdered erythritol OR stevia equivalent
2-3 tsp milk of choice, as needed

name: keto-chocolate-cookies
ingredients: 1/4 cup mini chocolate chips or sugar free chocolate chips
3 tbsp powdered sugar or powdered erythritol
1 tbsp coconut oil or additional milk
optional powdered sugar or erythritol to coat

name: vegan-chocolate-chip-cookies-recipe
ingredients: 1 cup white, oat, or spelt flour
1/4 cup sugar, unrefined if desired (For no sugar, try these Breakfast Cookies)
1/4 cup brown sugar or coconut sugar
2 tbsp milk of choice, plus more if needed
2 tbsp oil or melted vegan butter

name: keto-thin-mints-low-carb
ingredients: pinch uncut stevia OR 3 tbsp pure maple syrup
Only if using stevia, add 3 tbsp water
1/2 cup chocolate chips or sugar free chocolate chips

name: healthy-oreos
ingredients: 3/4 cup spelt, white, or oat flour
6 tbsp dutch cocoa powder – regular cocoa is fine; they just won’t taste as authentic
6 tbsp unrefined or regular sugar, or xylitol for sugar-free
2 tbsp pure maple syrup, honey, or agave

name: vegan-peppermint-cookies-recipe
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups  white, spelt, or oat flour (For low carb, try these Keto Cookies)
1/2 tsp each: baking powder and salt
6 tbsp oil or melted vegan butter

name: better-than-nutella
ingredients: 1/3 cup sweetener of choice  (see above for options that work here)
1/2 cup milk of choice or 2 tbsp oil, optional

name: cream-cheese-stuffed-cinnamon-sugar-pillow-cookies
ingredients: 1/2 cup sugar (or coconut sugar or xylitol)
1/4 cup cream cheese or vegan cream cheese
1 1/2 tbsp powdered sugar or sugar free powdered sugar
equal parts cinnamon and sugar or xylitol if desired for coating

name: lemon-meltaway-cookies
ingredients: 1 cup flour (white, spelt, or Bob's gf work)
1/4 cup finely chopped walnuts, almonds, or pecans (can omit for nut free)
1/4 cup powdered sugar, unrefined if desired
2 tsp lemon juice, plus 1 tsp zest (don’t omit)
if using coconut oil, add 1/8 tsp salt
optional additional powdered sugar for rolling

name: lemon-meltaway-cookies
ingredients: 1 cup flour (white, spelt, or Bob's gf work)
1/4 cup finely chopped walnuts, almonds, or pecans (can omit for nut free)
1/4 cup powdered sugar, unrefined if desired
2 tsp lemon juice, plus 1 tsp zest (don’t omit)
if using coconut oil, add 1/8 tsp salt
optional additional powdered sugar for rolling

name: vegan-snickerdoodles
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups spelt, white, or oat flour
1/2 tsp each: salt and baking powder
1/2 cup sugar, unrefined or xylitol if desired
6 tbsp oil or melted vegan butter
equal parts cinnamon and sugar (or xylitol) for coating

name: chocolate-no-bake-cookies
ingredients: 2 cups quick oats (For keto no-bakes, try these Fat Bombs)
1/2 cup peanut butter or allergy-friendly sub
1/2 cup pure maple syrup, honey, or agave (or 2/3 cup sugar and 1/2 cup milk of choice)
optional handful mini chocolate chips, shredded coconut, etc.
